body.name: Arm & Hammer Clean Burst, 170 Loads Liquid Laundry Detergent, 170 Fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 32 mins
features: One 170 fl oz bottle of ARM & HAMMER Clean Burst Liquid Laundry Detergent cleans 170 medium loads when used as directed
Concentrated laundry detergent is formulated to get out tough dirt and odors with 2X powerful stain fighters in every load versus leading value detergent
Blended with ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, this HE laundry detergent is formulated to deeply clean clothes
Liquid concentrated laundry detergent features a crisp, just-washed clean fragrance that infuses a fresh scent to towels, sheets, team uniforms and more
Clean-rinsing, low-sudsing formula won’t block HE machine sensors, making it an effective choice for both standard and HE washers
body.description: ARM & HAMMER Clean Burst Liquid Laundry Detergent powers out dirt and odors for the clean you need. This HE laundry detergent is concentrated with 2X powerful stain fighters in every load versus the leading value detergent, making it powerful enough to handle your toughest loads in all wash temperatures, even cold water. This low-sudsing laundry soap rinses clean and is designed to work in standard machines and High Efficiency (HE) models as an effective and efficient laundry cleaner and stain remover. Infuse a fresh scent into towels, sheets, team uniforms and more with the crisp, clean fragrance of this laundry detergent liquid. Blended with trusted ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, this HE detergent is tough on odors, dirt and stains, leaving clothes clean and smelling fresh. For standard bottles, fill the cap to Bar A for medium-sized loads, or use half a capful for energy-saving cold water cycles compared to washing in warm water. Use a full cap of this detergent for large or heavily soiled loads for a powerful clean at a smart, low price. For larger dispenser sizes, fill to the top of Line C for medium loads. For large or heavily soiled loads, use half a capful.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Arm & Hammer Clean Burst Liquid Laundry Detergent Arm & Hammer Clean Burst 5-in-1 Liquid Laundry Detergent Power Paks Arm & Hammer In-Wash Scent Booster Purifying Waters Scent Clean Burst Clean Burst Purifying Waters For Use In All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures All Washing Machines and All Water Temperatures Benefits Concentrated laundry detergent is formulated to get out tough dirt and odors with 2X powerful stain fighters in every load versus leading value detergent Concentrated wash detergent gives you the deep cleaning power of our trusted laundry detergent in a single Power Pak that’s formulated to get out tough dirt and odors with lasting freshness. This vibrant fragrance opens with a burst of sun-ripened citrus, juicy apple and dewy melon that blasts away odors. Create your own blast of sparkle to enhance and lift your days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s the best!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased Arm & Hammer detergent as it is known for its effective cleaning capabilities and affordability. I appreciate its ability to tackle tough stains and leave my laundry smelling fresh while not breaking the bank. This brand is recognized for including baking soda in its formulations, contributing to enhanced cleaning power and odor control. I will continue purchasing Arm & Hammer detergent as it does everything it claims to do, tough on stains and always leaves my laundry smelling fresh! Arm & Hammer is a very trusted brand in my family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Laundry Detergent ever
reviews.reviewText: I have tried a lot of laundry detergent, but Arm and Hammer is by far the best to use to clean your clothes and leaves a good smell in the clothes. It is very well priced and the deals come out very often where you can buy more than one at the time. You can't go wrong with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This detergent cleans very well and is a great price. Scent is also very nice. Will definitely continue to buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Trust the brand and does the job
reviews.reviewText: My clothes were not heavily perfumed after using this and that’s fine with me. I felt like my laundry was fresh and clean after each load and this really lasted me a LOT of loads. I haven’t had to buy detergent in about 2 months and I share this with two family members in my house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the value and the fact that a little goes a long way. So it lasts me a very long time. Even tho in my household we do a few loads every single day. I wish I could give it 5 stars but u honestly with the scent was a little but better. It smells good coming out of the jug..but once the clothes are washed and dried, not much of the scent remains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm so thankful that I can get this from Amazon by subscription and at a great price!It does a good job at getting clothes clean, even my husband's greasy, oily work clothes!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with this brand love the scent, we have to have a scent that is not strong floral and this fits in our family just great!!! Been using this for years!!!
